item.title: Resume
item.description:
About Me

Why I write code (long version)

I was introduced to computer programming around 2014 through Scratch, then Python. By the time when Home Assistants were just taking off, and the little boy in me thought they were just the coolest thing. That Christmas my parents got me this book (would highly reccomend) for Christmas, and by the following June I was taking my first classes for a B.S. in Data Science and Analytics.

I finished that degree this June, having now matured through my passion for code into a generally smart and well-rounded programmer. As my next step as in my career professional I am looking for a sofware development job where I can provide value to a team of excellent programmers, learn under their leadership, and become the best developer I can by programming like a madman.

Credentials

Projects

Experience

GCP Investments - Software Engineer (April 2025 - Present)

Refactor binary and network parsing code to be more robust and maintainable

Academic Center for Enrichment Middlesex Community College - Peer Tutor (August 2022 - May 2024)

Tutor fellow students in various mathematical disciplines from Calculus II to Statistics.

Teach students important study skills Inform students about resources in and outside of ACE that MCC provides AEOP GEMS, Natick Soldier Systems Center â€” Assistant Near Peer Mentor June 2022 - August 2022 Mentor teens and pre-teens working on STEM projects in Army Research Labs
